layout.name: health
layout.title: Health
layout.tooltip: How many hits it takes the NPC to die.

layout.name: flyAroundHorizontalTime
layout.title: Fly Around Horizontal Time
layout.tooltip: How many frames it takes the NPC to complete a full horizontal movement cycle.

layout.name: flyAroundHorizontalDistance
layout.title: Fly Around Horizontal Distance
layout.tooltip: How many pixels the NPC moves in each horizontal movement cycle.

layout.name: flyAroundVerticalTime
layout.title: Fly Around Vertical Time
layout.tooltip: How many frames it takes the NPC to complete a full vertical movement cycle.

layout.name: flyAroundVerticalDistance
layout.title: Fly Around Vertical Distance
layout.tooltip: How many pixels the NPC moves in each vertical movement cycle.

layout.name: throwProjectileID
layout.title: Throw Projectile ID
layout.tooltip: Which NPC is thrown out after the NPC fades in. Defaults to nothing.

layout.name: throwProjectileCount
layout.title: Throw Projectile Count
layout.tooltip: How many projectiles are thrown out after the NPC fades in.

layout.name: throwProjectileSpeed
layout.title: Throw Projectile Speed
layout.tooltip: The speed at which the NPC are thrown out at (in pixels per frame).

layout.name: throwProjectileAngle
layout.title: Throw Projectile Max Angle
layout.tooltip: The maximum angle of the thrown NPC's (in degrees). Has no effect if the throw count is 0.
